item.title: From memory there is at least 1 pot hole but could be more, 11th July
item.description:
From memory there is at least 1 pot hole, its as you drive along lobleys drive just before you go go above the M5, various potholes, some are in a position where you have to drive close to the white lines in the middle of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Path/Way misused by unlawful users problem, 11th July
item.description:
Customer has stated a sign has gone up (no horses or Bicycles) but people are ignoring them. Electric scooters and bikes frequent this area and it is dangerous, they have removed the kissing gate in the past. Please can PROW consider more signage up near the racecourse to deter this.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hygiene and health issues, 11th July
item.description:
Under bridge near White Hart Street. The issue of nesting pigeons, and the resulting pigeon droppings has been ongoing for years without a positive solution. The present cleaning is wholly insufficient in its regularity, resulting in unhealthy and disgusting conditions. A more permanent answer is needed to stop this degeneration along with the lower high street as well. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights can’t see the green light due to Louvre mis aligned, 11th July
item.description:
The traffic lights green signal has louvres and cannot be seen illuminated from the stationary position. Louvres on all of the lights need adjusting so the=at they can be seen appropriately - causing issues with traffic as they can’t see they are on green and don’t go, in case the red and amber has possibly failed . TRAFFIC HAZARD and not acceptable
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole -deep, 11th July
item.description:
Because you have had permits for the new build and half the road closed . Extensive damage and wear to the side that’s been open . Many duvets and pot holes that you cannot a valid as single file traffic . Road closure soon and cannot see why-y you can’t fix the area while the road is closed by Bromfords the main contractor of the new build .
Report on FixMyStreet
